name: Seymour
title: Seymour
desc: "Welcome back, milady. You are as gentle, lovely, and radiant as ever."

skills.desc:
When played: Copy 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck and add it to your Hand.
When you play a card whose name is not in the original deck at the start of the game: Adventure once. (Once per Round, up to twice)
